author: Bruce Osborne
subject: Where are those Lupin dudes?
body:
Well, for those who actually visit our Lupin Encyclopedia, you'll see that 
we've been really busy lately. Luis is getting hitched and been working on 
that...I on the other hand have projects, tests, work, and spotlight work 
I'm doing at my church's Christmas Pagent, so been busy with all those, but 
the week before break starts for school I'm going to be in Florida, come 
back, then I'll have all the free tiem I want during break. Me and Luis are 
whipping up something special for the page, just wanted to let you all know 
we aren't dead. Also, as for my fanfic, looks like I hit a bad spot again 
trying to figure out what to do. Not many people gave feedback on what they 
thought of the last two parts I wrote, surprised since so many emailed me 
bugging me to write more. :)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Bruce Osborne
